info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Oneida, Otsego, southeastern Madison, northwestern Delaware and central Chenango Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from South Brookfield to near Greene. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Norwich, Sidney, Davenport, Guilford, Brookfield, Worcester, Middlefield, Hartwick and Maryland. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 88 between 8 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
